about_the_game:
Explore the forgotten and abandoned summer camp "Camp Funtime". Explore and solve puzzles all while looking for clues as to why the camp was shut down, but be careful because there are horrors waiting to happen at every turn.

Welcome to Camp Funtime

Camp Funtime was once the best summer camp to go to. That was until it was permanently shut down from the public. No one got a proper explanation as to why the camp was shut down but that's where you come in. Try to survive and uncover the mysteries of the facility.... and don't get caught.

Meet Captain Kitty

Captain Kitty is a custom made animatronic made with one purpose, to spread laughter and joy to everyone he comes into contact with.

Exploring the camp

The camp is split into different areas that can all be reached by using our train system!



  • School Sector
While your kids are here, they will be taking educational and fun classes throughout their day. The school sector is home to our classrooms, cafeteria, and the gymnasium!



  • Playground Sector
Once your kids are done for the day, they have free time inside our custom-built playground located at the center of the camp! This giant playground was made with one intent... To ensure your kids have a "Funtime" while they are here. Play hide and seek, tag, or explore the playpark. Whatever your kids desire to play we have it all at our playground!



Will your kids be joining us? There's lots of fun to be had at "Camp Funtime"...

name: Camp Funtime

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
